definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: advise, counsel (only twice in Hex) (Aram. [[יְעט]]; Ar. wa9az.a exhort, admonish)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[יׇעַץ]] Is 7:5 + 11 t.; [[יׇעָָץ]] Is 14:27 + 2 t.; sf. [[יְעָחָָנִי]] Ps 16:7; [[יְעָחָהּ]] Is 23:9 + [[יְעָחָהוּ]] Baer 2Ch 10:8; 3 pl. [[יׇֽעֲחוּ]] Ps 62:5; sf. [[יְעָחֻהוּ]] 1Ki 12:8 + 2 t. (incl. 2Ch 10:8, Baer [[יְעָחָָהוּ]]); etc.; Impf. [[אִיעֲחָה]] Ps 32:8 (Ol Che [[אִיעָֽחְְ]]); [[אִיעָֽחְְ]] Ex 18:19, Nu 24:14 (not elsewhere Hex), Je 38:15, cf. also foregoing; [[אִיעָחֵח]] 1Ki 1:12; Pt. act. [[יוֹעֵץ]] Is 3:3 + 9 t.; cstr. [[יׁעֵץ]] Na 1:11, [[יוֹעֵץ]] 2Sa 15:2; [[יוֹעֲחֵח]] Mic 4:9; pl. [[יוֹעֲחִים]] Job 12:17 + 3 t.; [[יׁעֲחִים]] Ez Eze 11:2; cstr. [[יׁעֲחֵי]] Is 19:11 + 2 t., etc.; fs. sf. [[יוֹעַחְתּוֹ]] 2Ch 22:3; Pt. pass. f. [[יְעוּחָה]] Is 14:26; —advise, counsel, c. acc. Is 32:7, Is 32:8, Is 23:9 (subj. ´[[י]]) Mic 6:5; sq. [[בְּלִיַּ֫עַל]] Na 1:11, 7:5 (sq. [[עַל]] = against), Is 19:12 (sq. id.), Is 23:8 (sq. id.), Hb Hab 2:10 (sq. [[לְ]]); oft. c. acc. cogn. 2Sa 16:23, 2Sa 17:7, Ez Eze 11:2; sq. [[אֶל]] against Je 49:20, Je 50:45 (in both of ´[[י]]); sq. [[עַל]] against Je 49:30, Is 19:17 (of ´[[י]]); cf. pass. pt. Is 14:26; c. acc. cogn. + sf. pers. 1Ki 12:8, 1Ki 12:12, 1Ki 12:13, 2Ch 10:8; c. acc. pers. 2Sa 17:15, Ps 16:7, Ex 18:19, Nu 24:14 (+ rel. cl.) Je 38:15; abs. (of ´[[י]]) Is 14:24 (c. adv. [[כאשׁר]]), v:Is 14:27; of man 2Sa 17:15 ([[כזאת וכזאת]]), v:2Sa 17:21 ([[ככה]] + [[על]]); sq. inf. Ps 62:5, 2Ch 25:16 (of [[אלהים]]); sq. cl. without connective 2Sa 17:11; sq. [[לְלאׁ חָכְמָה]] Job 26:3; —[[אִיעֲחָה עליך עיני]] Ps 32:8 (v. supr.).—Pt. act. as subst. = counseller, king's adviser 2Sa 15:12, 1Ch 27:33, 2Ch 22:4, 2Ch 25:16, Ezr 7:28, Ezr 8:25, Is 19:11; so fem. 2Ch 22:3; prob. also 1Ch 27:32 (‖[[אִישׁ מֵבִין יְסוֹפֵר]]); cf. Mic 4:9, also Is 1:26 (‖[[שׁׂפְטִים]]), Job 12:17 (‖ id.);—in these three, of importance for people; so also is Job 3:3, Pr 11:14 = Pr 24:6; cf. Job 3:14, and particularly [[פֶּלֶא יוֹעֵץ]] Is 9:5 wonder of a counsellor, of the ideal ruler predicated. More generally, counsellor, adviser Pr 15:22; [[בְּשֶׂכֶל]] ´[[יו]] 1Ch 26:14 (specific reason for title unknown); ´[[יׁעֲ]] [[שָׁלוֹם]] Pr 12:20; = prophet Is 41:28, nearly = agents (hired by adversaries of Judah) Ezr 4:5.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: (reflex. or recipr.) Pf. [[נוֹעַץ]] Is 40:14; [[נוֹעֲחוּ]] Ps 71:10, Ps 83:6; Impf. [[וַיִּוׇּעַץ]] 1Ki 12:6 + 10 t.; [[יִוׇּֽעֲחוּ]] Is 45:21; [[וַיִּוׇּֽעֲחוּ]] 2Ch 30:23; [[נִוׇּֽעֲחָה]] Ne 6:7; Pt. pl. [[נוֹעָחִים]] 1Ki 12:6 + 4 t.;—consult together, exchange counsel, of king with advisers, sq. [[אֶת־]] 1Ki 12:6, 1Ki 12:8 = 2Ch 10:6, 2Ch 10:8; and so of ´[[י]] Is 40:14; sq. [[אֶל־]] 2Ki 6:8, 2Ch 20:21; sq. [[עִם]] 1Ch 13:1, 2Ch 32:3; abs. consider 1Ki 12:28, 2Ch 25:17, 2Ch 30:2; cf. 1Ki 12:6 (sq. inf.) = 2Ch 10:6, 1Ki 12:9 (sq. Impf. + [[ו]] subord.) = 2Ch 10:9; in gen. consult, take counsel, abs. Pr 13:10; [[יַחְדָּו]] Ps 71:10, Ne 6:7, Is 45:21; sq. [[לֵב יַחְדָּו]] (with heart together) Ps 83:6 nearly = determine, sq. inf. 2Ch 30:23. †

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִתְיׇעֲחוּ]] Ps 83:4 conspire against, sq. [[עַל]] (‖[[יַעֲרִימוּ סוֹד על]]).
